title: New MRI sensor can image activity deep within the brain

title_detail.value: New MRI sensor can image activity deep within the brain

summary: Researchers have developed an MRI-based calcium sensor that allows them to peer deep into the brain. Using this technique, they can track electrical activity inside the neurons of living animals, enabling them to link neural activity with specific behaviors.
